summary: Mock is a powerful testing library.  Unfortunately, there seems to be a trend of confusion and distress among those who are just getting started with Mock. This talk will highlight my experience learning Mock, and will list a few of the patterns that I've seen emerge during my quest for 100% test coverage.
title: My Adventures with Mock
